I don't have a proper outlet to actually buy comics anymore. The last comic store around here closed like a year ago and no book stores carry comics. Because a lot of manga site and anime streaming sites exist it's much more accessible to me.

topics.body:
This morning...

Ivy: Hey, let's move out and find an apartment so we can live together.
Me: I don't think think that the most efficient plan. Besides, our campus is only a 30-minute drive away.
Ivy: C'mon we'll call it our incestral house.
Me: ... No.
